_header: God that art of mights most
_description: Sir Gowther, a ‘Breton lai’ — in 12-line stanzas

BLRoy17Bxliii.First Lines:
GOd that art of myghtis mostffader and sone and holy
                    gost…
BLRoy17Bxliii.Last Lines:
…To heuyn blys here sowles wendWith angelys bryght of
                    ble
BLRoy17Bxliii.Editions:
Breul,  Karl,
                        ed.  
             Sir Gowther: Eine Englische Romanze aus dem xv.
                Jahrhundert….
         Oppeln: E. Franck, 1886. 
Utterson,  Edward Vernon. 
             Select Pieces of Early English Popular Poetry.
         London: Davison, 1817: 1.157.

NLS1931.First Lines:
…[ ] ȝht wemen nereAnd makyd horn with
                    chyld…
NLS1931.Last Lines:
…Gyff vs myȝt with hym to wonþat lord þat is
                    most of meyn Amen
NLS1931.Facsimiles:
Hardman,  Phillipa.

         Leeds Texts and Monographs, n.s. 16. Leeds: School of English,
            2000.
